name: Knitted Woods
description:
This is my first game (please no bully), made for the August Bitsy Jam (https://itch.io/jam/as-a-treat-bitsy), it's a very simple game but this is probably the reason I managed to finish it, I did everything from scratch in about a week.

You can download the soundtrack (the one used in the game plus an extended version)  here https://wanderingartist.bandcamp.com/album/music-for-videogames-unreleased-vol-1
